sentences.en: A baby is the embodiment of vulnerability.
A former company executive describes him as the embodiment of Nike's image.
sentences.cn: 公司前行政主管形容乔丹是耐克形象的化身.

sentences.en: Employment is the direct embodiment of the citizens'right to work.
sentences.cn: 就业是公民享有劳动权的直接体现.

sentences.en: He is the embodiment of evil.
He is the embodiment of the young successful businessman.
sentences.cn: 他是成功青年企业家的典型。

sentences.en: I'm the living embodiment of a warship, and I can't talk to you without getting tongue - tied.
sentences.cn: 我是一艘战舰的生命体化身, 除非把舌头连接在一起,否则我是不能和你说的.

sentences.en: It made my heart tighten to look at that figure - the embodiment of poverty and submission.
sentences.cn: 这个形象,这个贫穷与屈辱的化身,使我的心弦绷得紧紧的.

sentences.en: It was the embodiment of princely magnificence.
sentences.cn: 这体现了和亲王相称的富丽堂皇。

sentences.en: Marianne, emotional and sentimental, is the embodiment of sensibility.
sentences.cn: 脆弱易感又情感丰沛的玛莉安娜, 是感性的化身.

sentences.en: She is the embodiment of beauty.
The car for experimentation, is an embodiment of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 试验用汽车是一种科学技术的体现.

sentences.en: The commissar is the living embodiment of the Immortal Emperor's own will.
sentences.cn: 政委,可以说是伟大帝皇意志的最鲜活的化身.

sentences.en: The fluctuation of ocean freight is the embodiment of market risk.
sentences.cn: 运费波动是航运市场风险的集中反映.

sentences.en: The new factory is the embodiment of the very latest ideas.
sentences.cn: 这座新工厂是那些最新设想的体现.

sentences.en: The new highway is the embodiment of the very latest designing ideas.
sentences.cn: 这座新的高速公路是最新设计思想的体现.

sentences.en: The new super highway is the embodiment of the latest designing ideas.
sentences.cn: 这条新的高速公路是最新设计思想的体现.

words.tran_cn: 体现，使具体化；具体表达

trans.tran_en: someone or something that represents or is very typical of an idea or quality
